entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
